sentences.en: But this is what elementary demography makes clear.
sentences.cn: 但这是基础人口统计学弄清楚的事实.

sentences.en: But this mechanistic view of demography is destiny and economic policies do not matter.
sentences.cn: 战争问题中的唯心论和机械论的倾向,是一切错误观点的认识论上的根源.

sentences.en: Demography is the analysis of population variables.
sentences.cn: 人口学是对人口变量的分析.

sentences.en: His institute works on issues ranging from demography to labour shortages.
sentences.cn: 他的学院的研究领域从人口统计延伸到劳动力短缺.

sentences.en: In this study, the leaf demography was implemented with the method of randomized branch sampling.
sentences.cn: 本研究中, 我们采用随机枝取样法,研究了东灵山地区辽东栎的叶群体的数量动态.

sentences.en: It was partly to do with demography, partly to do with earnest muddleheadedness.
sentences.cn: 这一部分与人口统计有关, 一部分与憨头憨脑的热忱有关.

sentences.en: The study's findings were reported in the Demography.
sentences.cn: 人口统计学刊上报道了该研究结果.

sentences.en: The subject of demography has merged with that of reproductive strategies of organisms.
sentences.cn: 关于生命统计这个课题已渗入了关于有机体繁殖对策的课题.

sentences.en: This slow-motion disaster, demography insists, cannot be avoided without a major shift in resources.
sentences.cn: 这是一场缓慢进行的灾难，人口统计学仍坚持不能避免资源的主要转移。

words.tran_cn: 人口统计学的；人口学的
[统计] 人口统计学家，人口学家

trans.tran_en: the study of human populations and the ways in which they change, for example the study of how many births, marriages and deaths happen in a particular place at a particular time
